occurrences.context: ...But the reality is that you hear this thing about. following your heart. But notice what it says in Proverbs 28. Look in verse number 25. He that is of a proud heart stirreth up strife. But notice what it says. ...

...t does he do? He hears the instruction. But we understand some more information about a wise son in Proverbs 28, in verse number 7, whoso keepeth the law is a wise son. So it's not just hearing, it's keeping, it...
